competitors.name: eBay
competitors.notes: Major e-commerce competitor in auction and marketplace

competitors.name: AliExpress
competitors.notes: Launched in 2010, top competitor in retail e-commerce

competitors.name: Rakuten
competitors.notes: Dominant in Japan, purchased Buy.com in 2010

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure
competitors.notes: Founded in 2010 as AWS's first major cloud competitor

context: Amazon.com, Inc. is a e-commerce, cloud computing, and technology conglomerate focused on online retail, AWS cloud services, streaming, devices, and advertising. AWS became major profit driver. Kindle and digital content expanding. Prime membership growing.
